name: The Garden Game
description:
"Absolutely beautiful." - some guy Gary

You are Ganbatron 3000, intergalactic gardener extraordinaire. Your mission: Harvest as many space fruits as possible within the next two minutes.

How to play:

Move around with the arrow keys.

Pick up fruits when they grow by walking over them. You can only carry four fruits at a time. Drop off your fruits in the bushel in the lower left corner to score points.

If the gardens run out of water they will not produce any more fruits. Water the gardens by pressing Z. Refuel your watering can by walking to the pond in the top right corner.

Made for the 3rd Alakajam.

Source code is here.
